title: KREMA ZA TELO ALL OVER RESCUE, BARNÄNGEN, 200ML

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua (Water, Eau), Behenyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Propylene Glycol, Hexanediol, Caprylic/ Capric Triglyceride, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Allantoin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone.
